title: WHY WAS THERE NO COVERAGE OF THE AZALEA FESTIVAL PARADE?  BY NEITHER  CHANEL 3 OR 6...  I COULD\'T BELIEVE THAT THIS WAS NOT ON THE LOCAL CHANNELS.
